pages.text: Wait, what do you mean you want stone? Oh, so you tried to make a wooden pickaxe... Then it won't be big news if I told you it won't work. Wood is not strong enough to mine stone, so you will need something stronger. Do you remember what you used for the chopping blade? Since you have access to wood and wood planks, you can make a Crafting Table.
pages.title: Leave no stone unturned

pages.text: Get 3 pieces of flint, 2 sticks, and 2 plant fiber, put them into your crafting grid as shown above, and now you have a pickaxe strong enough to mine stone.
